[ library(m_tree234) | Third Party Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

values(+Tree, -ValueList)

Return all the values from a tree.
Tree
A 2-3-4 tree
ValueList
A list of all the values from Tree

Description

ValueList is a list of all the values appearing in the tree Tree.

This predicate should only be called with trees created by other predicates from the tree234 module.

Fail Conditions

Never fails.

Resatisfiable

no

See Also

values / 2
